title: The German language series. Part 4
creator_credit: University of Wisconsin and Herman J. Engel
brief_description: This series allows the student to hear and see native speakers of German conducting a conversation lasting about two minutes. The dialogue is broken down into parts which are repeated four times to allow the student to imitate the pronunciation and intonation of the speaker. Part four presents dialogue on the building of a new house, using basic sounds in complex sentences. In English and German.
